Extensions/CLLocationManager.html#/s:So1.name: requestLocationCC(authorizationType:satisfying:)
Extensions/CLLocationManager.html#/s:So1.abstract: Request the current location, with the ability to cancel the request.

Extensions/CLGeocoder.html#/s:So10CLGeoc.name: reverseGeocodeCC(location:)
Extensions/CLGeocoder.html#/s:So10CLGeoc.abstract: Submits a reverse-geocoding request for the specified location.

Extensions/CLGeocoder.html#/s:So10CLGeoc.name: geocodeCC(_:region:)
Extensions/CLGeocoder.html#/s:So10CLGeoc.abstract: Submits a forward-geocoding request using the specified address string within the specified region.

Extensions/CLGeocoder.html#/s:So10CLGeoc.name: geocodePostalAddressCC(_:preferredLocale:)
Extensions/CLGeocoder.html#/s:So10CLGeoc.abstract: Submits a forward-geocoding requesting using the specified locale and postal address
